reviewText: For Billy Wilder fans, this is a must.  Get this box set now before it is discontinued now that Sony distributes MGM's library.
Title: The Billy Wilder Collection

reviewText: Typical Wilder humor. Out there and absurd but very funny. Great period detail of early sixties. Exaggerated stereotypes actually work.
Title: The Billy Wilder Collection

reviewText: No Thanks...This is not a complete collection.The 'April Fools' In Cinemascope 1969 is missing and Billy Wilder's last movie  'Buddy Buddy' with Jack and Walter in Cinemascope is also missing. Get these on PAL and Have them Tranferred for a complete collection or just wait and wait and wait for Sony or whoever to make up their mind.
Title: The Billy Wilder Collection

reviewText: Sunset Boulevard, Some Like it Hot, Stalag 17, Double Indemnity. No, they're not here. But The Apartment and Avanti are. And even a few so-so ones here are worth your time. Plus, look at that cute Mr Magoo-like graphic of Billy Wilder on the box's cover. Complete opposite of the tough, hard-working little genius the guy was.
summary: Nobody's Perfect. But Wilder is close to perfection when it comes to storytelling.
Title: The Billy Wilder Collection

reviewText: I like revisiting Climax, NV once in a blue moon, just to watch Dean Martin poking almost sadistic fun at his screen persona, Kim Novak playing "downmarket" and Ray Walston trying to fill shoes vacated by Peter Sellers.  Not too sure Sellers would have done any better, and the film isn't without flaws.  Still, the laughs come quick and nasty, the Billy Wilder way.
Title: The Billy Wilder Collection

reviewText: Every single one of these films (excluding Irma la Douce) is worth seeing, and more than a few of them are masterpieces.  The masterpieces:  The Apartment, Some Like It Hot, Kiss Me Stupid, One Two Three.  The very good:  Witness for the Prosecution, The Private Life of Sherlock Holmes.  The merely "good":  Avanti.  The average:  The Fortune Cookie.  The embarrassment:  Irma la Douce.  If you are a fan of Billy Wilder, this is a must.
Title: The Billy Wilder Collection

reviewText: Really, really, really enjoying the DVDs in this collection. I bought this because I wanted to own The Apartment and Irma la Douce, decided to splurge on the whole set. First movie I saw was Avanti! and it was very good. It is a Golden Globe winner. Have also enjoyed the Sherlock Holmes and the Dean Martin movie (good campy 1960s movie).
Title: The Billy Wilder Collection

reviewText: This is a great collection of films by the great director Billy Wilder.  And a great price to boot!
Title: The Billy Wilder Collection
